Hey, everyone new to RPGing:

Crow Lord has volonteered (because he has nothing better to do) to
run 
a
'Beginners RPG' for the Neo Beast Wars RPG. This RPG will cover most 
RPGing
stuff (battle, etc...), and will (hopefully) make people in it better 
at
RPGing. It'll also be a good opportunity for experienced RPGers to 
improve
their skills.

PLEASE JOIN, WE NEED PEOPLE IN HERE, JUST THINK OF YOUR RPGING NOW
AND 
THINK OF IT 10X BETTER, WELL JOIN. PLEASE.
